properties.areaDesc: Coastal waters from Chincoteague to Parramore Island VA out 20 nm; Coastal waters from Fenwick Island DE to Chincoteague VA out 20 nm; Coastal waters from Parramore Island to Cape Charles Light VA out 20 nm
properties.headline: Small Craft Advisory issued January 12 at 7:48AM EST until January 12 at 7:00PM EST by NWS Wakefield VA
properties.description:
* WHAT...Southwest winds 15 to 25 kt with gusts up to 30 kt and
seaS 5 to 8 ft.

* WHERE...Coastal waters from Fenwick Island DE to Chincoteague
VA out 20 nm, Coastal waters from Chincoteague to Parramore
Island VA out 20 nm and Coastal waters from Parramore Island
to Cape Charles Light VA out 20 nm.

* WHEN...Until 7 PM EST this evening.

* IMPACTS...Conditions will be hazardous to small craft.
properties.instruction:
Inexperienced mariners, especially those operating smaller
vessels, should avoid navigating in hazardous conditions.

NWSheadline: SMALL CRAFT ADVISORY IN EFFECT UNTIL 7 PM EST THIS EVENING... ...GALE WARNING IS CANCELLED
